page.title: 04LOCAL CUSTOMS
page.content: IN THE{SECOND WORLD WAR}THE RECTORY IN SQ.10 WAS CONSIDERABLY DAMAGED. A GERMAN BOMBER ATTEMPTED TO BOMB IT. THE BOMB WAS DROPPED, IT GLANCED OFF A GRAVESTONE, AND BLEW A WHOLE WING OFF THE RECTORY. ANOTHER SUPERSTITION IS OF BECKHAM PALACE, THIS ALSO WAS USED IN THE WAR, THIS TIME IT WAS A PRIME PLACE FOR{SUPERNATURAL}HAPPENINGS. ALSO THERE IS A SUPERSTITION THAT IT IS HAUNTED. IF SOMEONE IN A FAMILY DIES, THE OTHERS PAINT THE BEEHIVES BLACK. LASTLY, IF TWO PEOPLE IN A VILLAGE DIES EVERYONE ELSE HAS TO BREAK A MATCHSTICK TO STOP A THIRD ONE DYING. {CHRIS TAYLOR. { {
